title: Israelgogo
author: Israelgogo
content: Everyone is born with hidden talents, we only discover it as we grow ,some talents are in built ,we may never find out until we go extra mile and put in our best at acheiving it .You are special, everyone has it own thing he is good at ,just discover yours ,sometimes it takes skills to find out how good we are in some things .When things seems no to go the way you imagined it,discover yourself ,know what you are good at and go for it ,some talents are acquired and instilled inside us. Know your abilities first ,then you will know your worth. It is never too late to discover ourself even at old age ,indulge in what works for you, what you find passion at ,doing. Then it comes easy to you.

comments.author: Sayakaaja
comments.body: in every deficiency there must be advantages, and in every advantage there must be disadvantages.Everyone's talent is very different. sometimes talent can also be developed through hobbies.Hobby is sometimes associated with talent. there are people who have a hobby of painting since they were small and when they grow up they still paint and even become painters, there are also people who have a hobby of cooking, reading and so on. it could be that all this time the hobby we do is the hidden talent we have.
